summary: A strange place, with all daedric and unique weapons.
descriptionHtml:
§§§§ NEW RELEASE OLD FILE/VIDEO HERE§§§§
§§§§ NEW RELEASE OLD FILE/VIDEO HERE§§§§
§§§§ NEW RELEASE OLD FILE/VIDEO HERE§§§§

GO HERE:   http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10098








I add a door in the Mountain near Riverwood. It teleport you to a strange place, where you can find daedric and some unique weapons like the giant mace which is playable. There is a way for go to a big ice thing if you follow the blue light. Yes it\'s cheats to have this weapons.

 But it\'s not finish now, doesn\'t know what to do next. So I add this and see if people like it.
Sorry for my english, it\'s not my native language. Thanks for ratings and report bug please, it\'s my first mod I do with the creation kit.

Instalation: Just a .esp files to drop in the data folder of Skyrim

(I use 2Kskyrim textures from Nebula and SkyUI on screens/video)

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GpX6BoBztaw&feature=player_embedded
author: Orangestorm
